kpi.name: Revenue Growth Rate
kpi.description: The rate of increase or decrease in a company's sales from one period to the next.

kpi.name: Gross Profit Margin
kpi.description: The proportion of money left over from revenues after accounting for the cost of goods sold (COGS).

kpi.name: Net Profit Margin
kpi.description: The percentage of revenue left after all expenses have been deducted from sales.

kpi.name: Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC)
kpi.description: The cost to acquire a new customer.

kpi.name: Customer Lifetime Value (CLTV)
kpi.description: The value of a customer over their entire relationship with a business.

kpi.name: Inventory Turnover
kpi.description: How efficiently a company manages its stock.

kpi.name: Sales Conversion Rate
kpi.description: The effectiveness of a sales team at converting leads into customers.

kpi.name: Employee Productivity
kpi.description: How much output each employee generates.

kpi.name: Operational Efficiency Ratios
kpi.description: Insights into how efficiently your business uses its assets to generate sales.
